long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Put HappyDoc next to your PIMS!

This chrome extension allows you to open HappyDoc right next to your PIMS, so you don't have to switch between tabs.

About HappyDoc:
HappyDoc is an AI Scribe for Vets. It works just like a human scribe, you could speak to a client naturally, and it listens to fill out the patient record, SOAP notes, vitals, etc. HappyDoc helps you reduce time spent on medical records by 95% and increase customer retention.
